Title: Changing Winds
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Heather Jeng Bladt, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Badison hustles to get back in Carol's good graces. Blanca longs to get pregnant -- and Nicky has a plan. Caputo and Figueroa's relationship evolves.
